data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gkrUCD-KGEoQ7kNvgHjX0LZ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAXM-O-BPOMSrjp81K4s9Wusp1EG_Ms8xrLuZqvAHqEPQ&oe=667D4B37)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BtB6bZujy3sQ7kNvgHnF9-S&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA86X3hkA4m8lOTNutfEECvm2PzTJDL8W4WmEY1YZOWBQ&oe=667D58D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=GtP5Iwlu73cQ7kNvgG4pbxM&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDjRLf9aMfH_-V2buxNpDLoLNrAikf_BLIgK037JXZfcA&oe=667D4409)
